entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is using magic to set up a tent.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A friend of Harry's, who is also using magic to help set up the tent.

entities.name: ron's dad
entities.description: Ron Weasley's father, who gave Hermione permission to borrow a tent.

entities.name: perkins
entities.description: A person at the Ministry who owns a tent that Harry and his friends are using.

relationships.description: Harry is setting up a tent, which implies that he has some connection to it.
Hermione is using magic to help set up the tent, indicating that she has a relationship with it.
Ron's dad gave Hermione permission to borrow a tent, establishing a connection between them.
Perkins owns the tent that Harry and his friends are using.
